title: Glamorous Swiss Getaway in one of the World’s Best Hotels
description: Experience a truly luxurious holiday at one of the world’s best hotels and embrace the classic elegance of Baur au Lac in Zürich. Located in the heart of this beautiful city, Baur au Lac has been offering guests amazing hospitality in opulent surrounds for 175 years. Whisk your loved one away for a romantic getaway and find out what old-world glamour feels like with daily breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, welcome gift of delicious Swiss chocolates, a US$200 credit for the hotel’s amazing restaurant helmed by a Michelin-starred chef, and more included.

title: Switzerland Trendy Zurich West City Break with Lavish Health Club
description: Immerse yourself in Zurich's lakeside beauty with an opulent stay at Crowne Plaza Zurich, an IHG Hotel - ideally positioned within the vibrant Zurich West District. Within this stylish hotel you will discover an expansive health club, a glittering pool and two sumptuous eateries. Beyond the hotel, find yourself in the heart of the global centre for banking and finance where picturesque cobblestone lanes, pre-medieval architecture and the twinkling Lake Zurich awaits.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Zurich, an IHG Hotel

title: Switzerland Trendy City Break in Zurich with Outdoor Pool & Wellness Area
description:
Step into a world where contemporary design meets Zurich’s creative pulse, set in the vibrant district of Zurich West. Sport-themed interiors, vibrant colours and playful touches create a unique atmosphere throughout the hotel, just steps from the city’s trendsetting boutiques and the celebrated Freitag Tower.

Make the most of the excellent onsite facilities, including a heated 25-metre pool, yoga and wellness area and a complimentary co-working space. When it's time to indulge, savour Mediterranean flavours at Ribelli restaurant or explore the neighbourhood’s renowned culinary scene, including Frau Gerolds Garten and the city's riverside restaurants.

title: Zurich Modern Hideaway Located opposite Hallenstadion
description: Stay a stone's throw from Zurich's famous Hallenstadion at Holiday Inn Zurich - Messe, an IHG Hotel. Located opposite the iconic concert hall and sports stadium, the hotel is is prime position to catch big name music acts or a ZSC Lions of the National League match. When you're not out and about, stay in and enjoy a bite to eat at Brasserie Bits&Bites for a taste of the local cuisine or relax with a night cap at the Lobby Bar or on the hotel's terrace.
location_description: Holiday Inn Zurich - Messe, an IHG Hotel
